title: File browser shows outdated file sizes
body: The file browser displays incorrect file sizes for files that have been modified outside of JupyterLab. The sizes shown are from when JupyterLab was first started, not the current sizes.

comments.body: This is related to the file watching system. We need to improve the refresh mechanism.
